OrgName.entry: CHILE SPORTS, CULTURE AND DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION

Desc.entry: Provides development, advice, sports, recreational, social, youth and cultural activities for the Chilean and Latin American communities in Sheffield and South Yorkshire. Offers IT suite for drop-in use. Also has a patchwork group working on experiences of being in exile.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Wed & Thurs 5-9pm (contact times); Thurs 7-9pm (Andes Testimony Group); Mon & Wed 5.30-9pm (Acceso Directo ICT Project)
